Our campus-wide Breathe campaign has won a Bronze Case Circle of Excellence Award! Beginning as a summer research project, Breathe was built as a way to make it easier for students to access mental health campus resources. It was launched in 2019 by students Michaela Kolenkiewicz '20 & Christiana Dunn '21, with guidance from Professor Angie Corbo. Learn more: bit.ly/30uKnrg

In awarding the campaign a Bronze, CASE judges wrote "We liked the simplicity of this campaign, and that students were the driving force in the creation of the initiative. This could easily become a national model for other institutions."
